bike.description: All-City Big Block™ 612 Select ChroMoly steel. Double butted down, top, and seat tubes. Externally tapered, ovalized, and dimpled chain stays, tapered seat stays. 120mm rear spacing, 1 1/8th head tube, English bottom bracket, 27.2 seatpost

components.description: All-City Big Block™ 612 Select ChroMoly tapered fork blades, lugged crown and matching dropout
Kalloy Black, four bolt, 1 1/8th threadless, 26.0 clamp
Tektro R538 Black, front installed rear in parts box
All-City 612 Track Crank 165mm, 144bcd, 46 tooth ring, black
TH Industries Steel cups, sealed bearing, 68X110mm
All-City Standard Track Black, Fixed/Free, 32 hole
